title: How to Cook Tofu Surprise

steps.headline: Wrap (Create your own style) 1 teaspoon of mixture in each won ton wrapper.
steps.description: Dab egg white on sides to seal wrapper.

steps.headline: Deep fry until golden brown.
steps.description: Drain. Serve with ketchup or sweet-and-sour sauce.

steps.headline: To make the sauce.
steps.description: combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Boil while stirring constantly until desired consistency is reached. Yield: about 38 pieces.

text: Combine filling ingredients.  Wrap (Create your own style) 1 teaspoon of mixture in each won ton wrapper. Dab egg white on sides to seal wrapper. Deep fry until golden brown. Drain. Serve with ketchup or sweet-and-sour sauce. To make the sauce. combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Boil while stirring constantly until desired consistency is reached. Yield: about 38 pieces. Finished.
